document.full_text: it didn't take long for chuck greenberg to become a very visible figure for the texas rangers, buying the team in a dramatic bankruptcy court showdown and then taking on the role of ceo and managing partner before the team's first-ever world series.
document.title: rangers ceo greenberg leaving organization
lines_and_colors: it didn't take long for chuck greenberg to become a very visible figure for the texas rangers, buying the team in a dramatic bankruptcy court showdown and then taking on the role of ceo and managing partner before the team's first-ever world series.
